issue.title: [R] Update flight.Rmd vignette
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13402](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13402). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Proposed changes:
 \* "we" -> "you"
 \* tiny bit more content in the intro about what flight is and why you might use it
 \* link to the dplyr vignette

comments.body:
